name: Amos Bow

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 12%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 8% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 15%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 10% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 18%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 12% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 21%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 14% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 24%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 16% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.

description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires the more.
